Bjarne Andersen wrote:

> Why is the following selftests not a part of the standard execution of
> the selftest:
>
> TrickyRelativeURIs
> SpacesInHrefPath
> SimpleJavascriptExtraction
> RobotsExclusion
> Refresh
> FormTagExtraction
> SimpleDocumentTypes
>
> They are excluded from execution in the index.jsp file in the root of
> the webapp selftest !!
> But they seem very relevant to execute in every selftest - especially on
> new versions of heritrix !!

Only server side of the selftest is present for the above listed tests.  
The client side of the selftest has yet to be developed (Testing robots 
would be a particularly good one to add).
St.Ack
